name: Drive-r Tricky Heavy Truck-s
description:
This is the professional 3D truck parking sim game.Are you want to drive a real big truck and spend some good time; play this game and feel the driving difficulty of a real massive machine driver with realistic HD quality graphics.Play and enjoy the challenging and newest large vehicle driving and extreme parking game.Jump and sit behind the wheels of a huge cargo trailer and park this monster vehicle in multiple different and increasingly challenging conditions.Driving and accurate parking a huge truck or trailer is a different and difficult thing than driving or parking a bus or a sports car. This is going to be real fun if it’s your dream to drive and park the massive machine.This is a complete chance for you,are you ready for the challenge? Can you drive and park the huge rig? If you want to become the cargo truck driver and an ultimate parker and if you think you have all the skills to drive and park the large trailer then this awesome game will give you a real challenge. Sit on the driving seat of a large vehicle drive it on the dangerous paths placed high in the air and park it accurately and precisely on the specified location.

In this wonderful game your main task is you have to take the steering wheel, drive your cargo truck smoothly in the air on the dangerous high ramps and park it on the given location accurately without the worry of time.Have you got all the cargo truck driving and parking expertise that you can complete or clear all the game missions and the parking tasks without falling from the high containers placed in the air? If you fall from the ramp or the container or the wooden bridge then your boss's mode will not be good and you have to start all the adventure again.So are you the professional trucker and can you drive your huge truck on the dangerous paths while facing the too many hurdles and other obstacles that come in your path.This is a total fun of driving and parking of huge cargo truck high in the air.Play the game give a test to your driving and parking skills and get the license of huge cargo truck driving and parking.This most addictive and adventures parking simulator needs your extreme patience, supreme expert level driving and parking skills and a handsome amount of determination. There are multiple challenging levels for you. Get all the three stars in every task and get the cash to unlock more missions and to buy most modern and powerful trucks.

If you like the parking and games then you will love to play this exciting and interesting game.Drive your truck with on screen easy controls. Beautiful astonishing environment will catch your attention. Multiple challenging and interesting missions will keep your interest in this simulation.Cool and amazing animations will add fun to the simulator. Multiple camera angles will give ease in your parking tasks.All ages of children can play this wonderful game.

How to Play:
Tap Left or Right button to move your truck left or right.
Tap accelerator button to increase speed of the cargo truck
Tap break button to stop or reduce the speed of truck
Tap the camera icon to change the camera view.

Features:
latest and powerful trucks
3d beautiful air environment
Multiple camera angles
Easy and intuitive controls
Stunning ultra HD graphics
Realistic and effective sounds
